text: The BSFSampler and the BSF Pre and PostProcessor do not use the same UI for parametrization. For a consistent UX they should.
creator: rbargezi@infonic.net
rbargezi@infonic.net
text:
Created attachment 27804
Proposed enhancement as a patch to Revision 1182604 of JMeter

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
